physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: <0.03 mU/liter, Free T3: 8.1 ng/liter, Free T4: 15.3 ng/liter
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased echogenicity of thyroid parenchyma; thyroid volume: 16 ml (normal range: 4-16 ml); ultrasound revealed hypoplastic thyroid gland for patient 2. No functional active thyroid tissue observed in the I131 scintigraphy for patient 2 and patient 3.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Behavior problems improved and thyroid function normalized after methimazole treatment.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: 74.5 mU/liter (normal range: 0.5-8.5 mU/liter), T4: 3.8 pmol/liter (normal range: 18-27 pmol/liter)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient 2: Elevated TSH and low Free T4 levels; thyroid gland was hypoplastic; functional active thyroid tissue was not observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: L-T4 treatment was initiated immediately after diagnosis.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: elevated levels above 75 mU/liter (normal range: 0.5-8.5 mU/liter), T4: <2.57 pmol/liter (normal range: 18-27 pmol/liter)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient 3: No visible thyroid gland in I131 scintigraphy; normal thyroid gland observed in ultrasound.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: L-T4 supplementation was started directly after diagnosis.
